snippet: While he predicted a steep slowdown in growth in 2012, Prime Minister Wen Jiabao told China’s handpicked legislature that the economy was robust.
lead_paragraph: While he predicted a steep slowdown in growth in 2012, Prime Minister Wen Jiabao told China’s handpicked legislature that the economy was robust.

headline.seo: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao of China Opens Legislature
headline.main: In China’s Annual Assessment, Wen Is Optimistic
headline.print_headline: In China’s Annual Assessment, Wen Is Optimistic
